title: Key fragment bug? Again?
body:
Heyo everyone.
I've listened that after the new honor system came out , the keys are dropping in everygame to everyone if you are lvl 2 or higher (honor lvl)
I've been playing a lot games the past week and i havent got anything .

current honor lvl : 2

PS : if you read this and you actually bother to give a hand ,good luck with your games , with your life and everything <3

replies.body: Key fragments aren't meant to be dropping in every single match if you're honor level 2 or higher. As long as you're [**honor level 2 or higher**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) you can get those key drops, but you still get about the same amount as you used to.

damn *sadface*

Is there any way to check the drop rates? i 've seen people previous post asking the same thing but those posts were 7months ago ..
I don't actually have all the details on those key fragment drop rates, but they're meant to be spread evenly throughout the 4 week cycle.
